title: Mon Post Show (04-18-22)
itunes:title: Mon Post Show (04-18-22)
description:
Bobby starts by talking to Abby about a note she wrote on a story about Joe Exotic getting engaged. We try to figure out what the note was before she reveals how she related to the story. Bobby will be announcing his comedy shows next Monday. Bobby talks about a documentary he is excited for. Florida Man watched Spider-Man almost 300 times. Raymundo had to talk to a therapist for gambling addiction.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
